mapper.select:
SELECT A.F_TRNSC_ID id, C.NAME BANK, D.ACC_DESC BANK_ACC_NAME, A.F_TRNSC_DT TRNSC_DT, A.F_TRNSC_REF_CHQ_NO CHQ_NO, A.F_TRNSC_REF_VA_NO, A.F_TRNSC_REF3 REF3, A.F_TRNSC_REF1 REF1, A.F_TRNSC_REF4 REF4, A.F_TRNSC_REF2 REF2, A.F_TRNSC_REF6 REF6, A.F_TRNSC_REM TYPE, A.F_TRNSC_DEBT_AMT DEBT, A.F_TRNSC_CRDIT_AMT CRDIT,
(CASE WHEN A.OTH_KEYIN_STUS_ID = 1 THEN 'Mapped' ELSE 'UnMapped' END) STUS, A.OTH_KEYIN_MAPPING_DT, A.F_TRNSC_TELLER_ID, A.F_TRNSC_NEW_CHQ_NO FROM PAY0081D A JOIN PAY0079D B on A.F_BANK_JRNL_ID = B.F_BANK_JRNL_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0004M C on B.BANK_ID = C.BANK_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M D on B.F_BANK_JRNL_ACC_ID = D.ACC_ID AND (D.IS_PAY_CASH = 1 OR D.IS_PAY_ONLINE = 1 OR IS_PAY_CHQ = 1) WHERE 1=1
AND A.F_TRNSC_DT >= TO_DATE(#{bankDateFr}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AND A.F_TRNSC_DT < TO_DATE(#{bankDateTo}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') + 1
